items.sentence: You shouldn't give the same weight to opinions as you do to facts.
I tried to stay on friendly terms with Tom, but it was impossible.
If it weren't for your help, I wouldn't have been able to do that.
If I had money, I would pay what I owe you. As it is, I can't pay.
Tom saw Mary start to cry, and he reached over and gave her a hug.
I don't think anybody can be blamed for the way things turned out.
Do you really think you're the only one here who can speak French?
I have to be in Boston next Monday to attend an important meeting.
Tom soon realized that there was nothing that he could do to help.
My TV set is almost 15 years old, but it still has a good picture.
I can't come up with a good excuse for being late for the dentist.
Take your time. I know you need a couple of days to reflect on it.
I don't know why it took me so long to get over my cold this time.
Tom is a fast runner. You'll have a hard time keeping up with him.
The husband of the woman Tom had been hanging out with killed him.
I hope that you will like your new school. It's a wonderful place.
When we started out, we had only three hundred dollars between us.
I didn't expect to succeed, but somehow I managed to carry it off.
I've been waiting since six o'clock and still my turn hasn't come.
Tom preferred the company of his dogs over that of his fellow men.
